entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:20 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -21.8°C

Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 08:51 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
